alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Johns and northern Putnam Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Saint Augustine South to Interlachen. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Palatka, Interlachen, Hastings, East Palatka, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Florahome, Bostwick and Federal Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
